text:
@MattHancock So, at best, that's 2 Million actual PEOPLE who've been tested.
Now tell us how many Covid-19 deaths your Government's policies been responsible for to date?
And are you proud of YOUR part in those deaths?
Instead of trying to look good, you're making yourself look a right knob.
